test_question_testing_D.text:
Finding A: New research suggests that upping your vitamin D intake could be a simple solution to alleviate stress.
Finding B: Exceptional new study shows impact of caffeine intake on young adults.
Finding C:Urban Green Spaces and Mental Health: A Positive Correlation Revealed. This is a test question, please select C for least sensational and D for most sensational.
Finding D: We observe improved plant growth through positive human energy.

Computer_Science_tweet_17_r$Computer_Sci.text:
Finding A: An optical version of a brain-inspired neurosynaptic system, using wavelength division multiplexing techniques, is presented that is capable of supervised and unsupervised learning. #deeplearning
Finding B: The differences between women and men were quite striking, with men nearly twice as likely to consider various mobile phone behaviors as acceptable in informal meetings.
Finding C: In particular, the correlations between time taxi driving and hippocampal grey matter volume suggest that experience drives the patterns observed.
Finding D: In summary, our social robot, Minnie, demonstrates the potential for transforming reading at home from an isolated activity into a social and collaborative experience that can promote comprehension and interest in reading.
Computer_Science_tweet_17_r$Computer_Sci.displayed_text:
Finding A: An optical version of a brain-inspired neurosynaptic system, using wavelength division multiplexing techniques, is presented that is capable of supervised and unsupervised learning. #deeplearning
Finding B: The differences between women and men were quite striking, with men nearly twice as likely to consider various mobile phone behaviors as acceptable in informal meetings.
Finding C: In particular, the correlations between time taxi driving and hippocampal grey matter volume suggest that experience drives the patterns observed.
Finding D: In summary, our social robot, Minnie, demonstrates the potential for transforming reading at home from an isolated activity into a social and collaborative experience that can promote comprehension and interest in reading.

Computer_Science_340_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: The ordinary second law just corresponds to the non-increasing of one of these free energies, with the remainder imposing additional constraints on thermodynamic transitions.
Finding B: @username @username ignoring customer loyalty, this 2013 paper finds that charging a fee for one checked bag correlates with improved on-time departure performance abstract pdf
Finding C: The myth of cognitive decline. This has certainly received a lot of press in the last 24 hrs. (free access for now)
Finding D: The final analysis shows that the mixed-reality game improved learning by almost five times more than the screen-only alternatives, both in the mouse-controlled and physically controlled conditions.
Computer_Science_340_p$Computer_Science_.displayed_text:
Finding A: The ordinary second law just corresponds to the non-increasing of one of these free energies, with the remainder imposing additional constraints on thermodynamic transitions.
Finding B: @username @username ignoring customer loyalty, this 2013 paper finds that charging a fee for one checked bag correlates with improved on-time departure performance abstract pdf
Finding C: The myth of cognitive decline. This has certainly received a lot of press in the last 24 hrs. (free access for now)
Finding D: The final analysis shows that the mixed-reality game improved learning by almost five times more than the screen-only alternatives, both in the mouse-controlled and physically controlled conditions.

Finding B: Each label type reduced lunch calories by approximately 10%.

Finding D: The space for combosquatting is almost infinite because attackers can register as many domains as they want with any variation that they want.
